data.title: Lake Zurich, IL Weather
data.meta_description: Lake Zurich, IL average temperature is 48.0F, which ranked #1396 in Illinois. Historical Lake Zurich weather info such as min/max temperature, precipitation/snow data as well as heating and cooling cost index also included.
data.text:
The average temperature of Lake Zurich is 48.02°F, which is lower than the Illinois average temperature of 51.37°F and is much lower than the national average temperature of 54.45°F.

Topics:Heating Cost IndexCooling Cost IndexHistorical TemperatureHistorical PrecipitationHistorical SnowHistorical HumidityHistorical Wind Speed

Historical Weather

Heating Cost Index, #1376

Lake Zurich, IL 309.98Illinois 266.80U.S. 212.91

Cooling Cost Index, #88

Lake Zurich, IL 42.78Illinois 105.52U.S. 139.42

The Heating Cost Index and the Cooling Cost Index are indicators of the relative heating and cooling cost of an area. They were calculated based on the average temperate and duration of the hot and cold days for the area. Please note, the actual heating cost and cooling cost are also dependent on other factors specific to individual residences such as the size of the house, the insulation condition, and the equipment efficiency, etc.
